ICPMF Webinars are developed to fulfill the ICPMF vision and mission: promoting food modelling and predictive microbiology, bridging science and industry, and providing training resources for food modellers.

Webinars produced and supported by ICPMF or in collaboration with other institutions and organizations are available in this section.
